newsitem.title: GERMANY: Condor to start weekly Denver flight Nov 24.
newsitem.headline: Condor to start weekly Denver flight Nov 24.

text.p: Condor Flugdienst GmbH, the holiday airline unit of Deutsche Lufthansa AG, said it would launch a weekly flight to Denver on November 24.
The airline will fly Mondays from Cologne to Denver with a 269-seat Boeing 767-300ER aircraft.
Condor managing director Franz Schoiber said the flight would meet growing German demand for winter skiing in the Rocky Mountains and would be operated until next April.
Condor would also add a third weekly flight to Mauritius and operate all 17 weekly flights to the Dominican Republic as nonstop Boeing 767 services.
